question:
This question is a part of The 5 lb. Book of GRE Practice Problems (2nd Ed.) - VERBAL
Many people erroneously believe that humans are naturally _________ to distrust or even fear those outside of their social or cultural group; anthropologists and social scientists, however, have consistently shown that xenophobia is a learned behavior.
indoctrinated
proven
prone
disposed
taught
compelled
Show
Hide
Answer
